articles.content: A bipartisan group of congressional lawmakers is asking the Justice Department to launch a probe into Amazon and its top executives over whether they lied to or misled Congress over the company's bus… [+4362 chars]

articles.title: The future of work: Companies open offices in the metaverse - Cointelegraph
articles.description: An event firm, a media company, a bank and a crypto exchange started their entry into the metaverse.
